verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall make a singular <S%H6381><s%> vow, <S%H5088><s%> the persons <S%H5315><s%> shall be for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by your estimation. <S%H6187><s%>

And your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be of the male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> even to sixty <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> even your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> it be a female, <S%H5347><s%> then your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels. <S%H8255><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it be from five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> even to twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> then your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be of the male <S%H2145><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> and for the female <S%H5347><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels. <S%H8255><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it be from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> even to five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> then your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be of the male <S%H2145><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and for the female <S%H5347><s%> your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be three <S%H7969><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it be from sixty <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and above; <S%H4605><s%> if <S%H518><s%> it be a male, <S%H2145><s%> then your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> and for the female <S%H5347><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels. <S%H8255><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> he be poorer <S%H4134><s%> than your estimation, <S%H6187><s%> then he shall present <S%H5975><s%> himself before <S%H6440><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall value <S%H6186><s%> him; according <S%H6310><s%> to his ability <S%H5381><s%> that vowed <S%H5087><s%> shall the priest <S%H3548><s%> value <S%H6186><s%> him.

And if <S%H518><s%> it be a beast, <S%H929><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> men bring <S%H7126><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that any man gives <S%H5414><s%> of such to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

He shall not alter <S%H2498><s%> it, nor <S%H3808><s%> change <S%H4171><s%> it, a good <S%H2896><s%> for a bad, <S%H7451><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a bad <S%H7451><s%> for a good: <S%H2896><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> he shall at all change <S%H4171><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> for beast, <S%H929><s%> then it and the exchange <S%H8545><s%> thereof shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it be any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> they do not offer <S%H7126><s%> a sacrifice <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> then he shall present <S%H5975><s%> the beast <S%H929><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall value <S%H6186><s%> it, whether <S%H996><s%> it be good <S%H2896><s%> or bad: <S%H7451><s%> as you value <S%H6187><s%> it, who are the priest, <S%H3548><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall it be.
But if <S%H518><s%> he will at all redeem <S%H1350><s%> it, then he shall add <S%H3254><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof to your estimation. <S%H6187><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall estimate <S%H6186><s%> it, whether <S%H996><s%> it be good <S%H2896><s%> or bad: <S%H7451><s%> as the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall estimate <S%H6186><s%> it, so <S%H3651><s%> shall it stand. <S%H6965><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> he that sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it will redeem <S%H1350><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> then he shall add <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part of the money <S%H3701><s%> of your estimation <S%H6187><s%> to it, and it shall be his.

And if <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> some part of a field <S%H7704><s%> of his possession, <S%H272><s%> then your estimation <S%H6187><s%> shall be according <S%H6310><s%> to the seed <S%H2233><s%> thereof: an homer <S%H2563><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be valued at fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> he sanctify <S%H6942><s%> his field <S%H7704><s%> from the year <S%H8141><s%> of jubilee, <S%H3104><s%> according to your estimation <S%H6187><s%> it shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> he sanctify <S%H6942><s%> his field <S%H7704><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the jubilee, <S%H3104><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall reckon <S%H2803><s%> to him the money <S%H3701><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6310><s%> to the years <S%H8141><s%> that remain, <S%H3498><s%> even to the year <S%H8141><s%> of the jubilee, <S%H3104><s%> and it shall be abated <S%H1639><s%> from your estimation. <S%H6187><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> he that sanctified <S%H6942><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> will in any wise redeem <S%H1350><s%> it, then he shall add <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part of the money <S%H3701><s%> of your estimation <S%H6187><s%> to it, and it shall be assured <S%H6966><s%> to him.

And if <S%H518><s%> he will not redeem <S%H1350><s%> the field, <S%H7704><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> he have sold <S%H4376><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> it shall not be redeemed <S%H1350><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

But the field, <S%H7704><s%> when it goes <S%H3318><s%> out in the jubilee, <S%H3104><s%> shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as a field <S%H7704><s%> devoted; <S%H2764><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> thereof shall be the priest's. <S%H3548><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> sanctify <S%H6942><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a field <S%H7704><s%> which he has bought, <S%H4736><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is not of the fields <S%H7704><s%> of his possession; <S%H272><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall reckon <S%H2803><s%> to him the worth <S%H4373><s%> of your estimation, <S%H6187><s%> even to the year <S%H8141><s%> of the jubilee: <S%H3104><s%> and he shall give <S%H5414><s%> your estimation <S%H6187><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> as a holy <S%H6944><s%> thing to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

In the year <S%H8141><s%> of the jubilee <S%H3104><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to him of whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> it was bought, <S%H7069><s%> even to him to whom <S%H834><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> did belong.

And all <S%H3605><s%> your estimations <S%H6187><s%> shall be according to the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%> shall be the shekel. <S%H8255><s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of the beasts, <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> should be the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> firstling, <S%H1069><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it; whether <S%H518><s%> it be ox, <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sheep: <S%H7716><s%> it is the LORD's. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it be of an unclean <S%H2931><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> then he shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> it according to your estimation, <S%H6187><s%> and shall add <S%H3254><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> part of it thereto: <S%H5921><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> it be not redeemed, <S%H1350><s%> then it shall be sold <S%H4376><s%> according to your estimation. <S%H6187><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%H389><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> devoted <S%H2764><s%> thing, that a man <S%H376><s%> shall devote <S%H2763><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that he has, both of man <S%H120><s%> and beast, <S%H929><s%> and of the field <S%H7704><s%> of his possession, <S%H272><s%> shall be sold <S%H4376><s%> or redeemed: <S%H1350><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> devoted <S%H2764><s%> thing is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

None <S%H3606><s%> <S%H3808><s%> devoted, <S%H2764><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be devoted <S%H2763><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> shall be redeemed; <S%H6299><s%> but shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> whether of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> or of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree, <S%H6086><s%> is the LORD's: <S%H3068><s%> it is holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> will at all redeem <S%H1350><s%> ought of his tithes, <S%H4643><s%> he shall add <S%H3254><s%> thereto <S%H5921><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof.

And concerning the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the herd, <S%H1241><s%> or of the flock, <S%H6629><s%> even of whatever <S%H3605><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the rod, <S%H7626><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

He shall not search <S%H1239><s%> whether <S%H996><s%> it be good <S%H2896><s%> or bad, <S%H7451><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he change <S%H4171><s%> it: and if <S%H518><s%> he change <S%H4171><s%> it at all, then both it and the change <S%H8545><s%> thereof shall be holy; <S%H6944><s%> it shall not be redeemed. <S%H1350><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
